text: The Indonesia national under-17 football team represents Indonesia in youth international football completions. They have hosted the 2023 FIFA U-17 World Cup where they exited in the group stage. ==Competitive record== ===FIFA U-17 World Cup=== finals record finals record finals record finals record finals
